name: Crash And Run
description:
Welcome to Crash And Run, a fun new game where you race with your friends in a head-to-head 4-Player race.

Unique maps and Settings
Each map is unique and distinctive, with different themes and gameplay gimmicks.

Fun Obsticals
Enjoy a number of fun obstacles and challenges to best in order to carry the victory.

Full Online Multiplayer
Connect with your friends from anywhere through the lobby system, complete with options for private matches, maximum number of players, a chat system, and more.

Fun Power Ups
Encounter a number of fun powerups to boost your abilities and screw with your friends to spice up the festivities.

And most importantly, it's a Race.
First to the end gets the victory. May the best win.
